report.title: MDMA & Supplement Loading Protocol
report.author: HR
report.bodytext: MDMA Protocol /n /n Night prior (8-12 hours prior to ingestion): 1 Prozac, 20mg /n /n Morning on waking: 4-5 Cal-Mg tablets. (Must be CHELATE: Not Dolomite or /n Oyster Shell) and 50 - 100mg 5-HTP /n /n Ingestion: 2-3 Cal-Mg tablets /n /n Booster: 2-3 Cal-Mg tablets. 50 - 100 mg 5-HTP /n /n 4hrs after Ingestion: 1 Prozac, 20mg /n /n Remarks: /n /n Cal-Mg is best absorbed as Chelate. Takes 8 hours for Carbonate (Dolomite). /n Total dose is about 2 RDAs, not very much. Eliminates Jaw Chattering. Also /n note, that the Jaw is the primal expressive organ for all chordates, and /n serotonin very applicable. Full leeches given serotonin then double their /n blood load. Knowing this paradoxically lessens jaw problems, part of psych /n prep for new users (sez my foaf). /n /n Prozac reduces tendency to clench and grind jaw. Considerably molllifies /n the wiped out feeling for the day after. Have no reports re other SSRIs /n such as Zoloft. /n /n 5-HTP lenghens the return time, much smoother and lasts longer. Seems to /n allow learning to be absorbed better. /n /n Note that side effects curve is steep, try 20mg less and you may have much /n less of them. /n /n PS. This protocol is very effective and known to work well.
